name: NutanixUnofficial
0:
”Alexa, open Nutanix Unofficial.”
”Alexa, ask Nutanix Unofficial to get cluster summary.”
”Alexa, ask Nutanix Unofficial for cluster critical alerts.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nutanix unofficial
des:
This Alexa Skill connects to a remote Nutanix cluster and enables users to retrieve information from the PRISM REST API using voice commands. Enjoy your first experience managing a Nutanix cluster using Alexa voice commands. This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Nutanix.

Examples:
Alexa, open Nutanix Unofficial.
Alexa, ask Nutanix Unofficial to get cluster summary.
Alexa, ask Nutanix Unofficial for cluster critical alerts.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
